identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% educational platform that feels human, engaging, and distinct from generic SaaS templates.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix academic rigor with playful discovery.
Emotion First: Design for confidence and focus, not just utility.
Content is King: Every screen tells a story of progress.
Zoom In: Focus on the details that matter (e.g., the exam timer, the submit button).
Negative Space: Let the content breathe.

theme_strategy.rationale: Light mode promotes clarity and focus for reading-heavy tasks like exams. Dark mode elements will be used for high-contrast 'Focus Mode' during actual test-taking.

primary.name: Academic Indigo
primary.usage: Primary actions, active states, brand anchor.

secondary.name: Growth Teal
secondary.usage: Success states, progress indicators, positive reinforcement.

headings.usage: All section headers, page titles, and hero text. DO NOT use Inter.

mono.usage: Math equations, code snippets, exam timers.

spacing.base: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 where others use p-4.

grids.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode A). Mix of col-span-1, col-span-2, and row-span-2 items.
grids.exam_taking: Split screen (Question Left / Answer Right) or Single Column Focus.

containers.card_style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/20 hover:shadow-indigo-500/40 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-3 bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300
buttons.ghost: rounded-lg px-4 py-2 text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900

inputs.style: rounded-lg border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-100 focus:border-indigo-500 transition-all

cards.dashboard_widget: rounded-2xl bg-white border border-slate-100 p-6 shadow-[0_2px_10px_-4px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)]

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, clean icons, active state: bg-indigo-50 text-indigo-600 border-r-2 border-indigo-600
navigation.mobile_nav: Bottom sheet or floating pill menu.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on solid backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Colored shadows (e.g., shadow-indigo-500/10) for a premium feel.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders with very light opacity (slate-200) for structure.
visual_enhancers.decorations: Abstract geometric shapes (circles, pills) in background with low opacity (blur-3xl).

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

hero_student.usage: Landing page hero or student dashboard welcome.

anti_patterns: NO dense, cluttered grids without breathing room.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end educational platform. It should feel like a modern consumer app (like Duolingo or Masterclass), not a boring LMS.
instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Install 'lucide-react' for icons, 'framer-motion' for animations, 'recharts' for charts, and 'clsx'/'tailwind-merge' for class handling.
instructions_to_main_agent.fonts: Import 'Plus Jakarta Sans' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts. Use 'Inter' as default sans.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Use Tailwind arbitrary values sparingly. Rely on the theme configuration.
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. Use semantic HTML.

universal_guidelines.css_reset: Ensure box-sizing: border-box; and smooth scrolling.
universal_guidelines.interaction: All interactive elements must have a hover and focus state.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and major containers.
